oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Prevalence of lung lesions using thoracic ultrasonography in pre-weaned calves from dairy herds in Quebec, Canada
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Buczinski, S.
Borris, M. E.
Dubuc, J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: lung lesions
pneumonia
Thoracic ultrasonography
dairy cattle
lung consolidation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Thoracic ultrasonography and observation of lung ultrasonographic consolidation has been recently developed as a fast and non-invasive way to assess bronchopneumonia-associated lung lesions. The objective of this cross-sectional study was to assess the prevalence of lung consolidation in pre-weaned calves in dairy herds.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2016; 153
